address.docs:
**, int**: The I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x39`.

*See also: [apds9960 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9960.html#configuration-variables)*

ambient_light_gain.docs:
**, int**: The ambient light gain level. One of 1x, 4x, 16x, 64x. Defaults to `4x`.

*See also: [apds9960 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9960.html#configuration-variables)*

gesture_gain.docs:
**, int**: The proximity gain level. One of 1x, 2x, 4x, 8x. Defaults to `4x`.

*See also: [apds9960 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9960.html#configuration-variables)*

gesture_led_drive.docs:
**, int**: The gesture LED drive level in mA. One of 100mA, 50mA, 25mA, 12.5mA. Defaults to `100mA`.

*See also: [apds9960 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9960.html#configuration-variables)*

gesture_wait_time.docs:
**, int**: The gesture wait time in ms. One of 0ms, 2.8ms, 5.6ms, 8.4ms, 14ms, 22.4ms, 30.8ms, 39.2ms. Defaults to `2.8ms`.

*See also: [apds9960 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9960.html#configuration-variables)*

led_drive.docs:
**, int**: The LED drive level in mA. One of 100mA, 50mA, 25mA, 12.5mA. Defaults to `100mA`.

*See also: [apds9960 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9960.html#configuration-variables)*

proximity_gain.docs:
**, int**: The proximity gain level. One of 1x, 2x, 4x, 8x. Defaults to `4x`.

*See also: [apds9960 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9960.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [apds9960 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9960.html#configuration-variables)*

direction.docs:
**, string**: The direction to measure. One of:
  * `UP`
  
  * `DOWN`
  
  * `LEFT`
  
  * `RIGHT`
  
  

*See also: [apds9960 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9960.html#binary-sensor)*

type.docs:
**, string**: The type of sensor measurement. One of
  * `CLEAR`
  
  * `RED`
  
  * `GREEN`
  
  * `BLUE`
  
  * `PROXIMITY`
  
  

*See also: [apds9960 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/apds9960.html#sensor)*
